title: Optimal volume for the draw-and-return methods to enhance activated partial thromboplastin time ratio accuracy in hemodialysis patients with central venous catheters
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Chitrada Thongdee, Lalita Lumkul, Pakpoom Wongyikul, Nantana Spilles, Boonruksa Laonapaporn, Jayanton Patumanond, Phichayut Phinyo
